p.1: =E2=80=A2 Postgres data engineer working with Google cloud platform
p.2: =E2=80=A2 Design relational logical data models and their physical schema design
p.3: =E2=80=A2 Develop functions, SQL statements in PL/pgSQL and stored procedures to maintain business logic.
p.4: =E2=80=A2 Data analysis, verification and handle large volume of data
p.5: =E2=80=A2 Build software solutions and functionality to meet customer requirements
p.6: =E2=80=A2 Actively participate improving application functionality and performance
p.7: =E2=80=A2 Research and come up with solutions for query performance tuning, best practices and solution adjustments for postgres database.
p.8: =E2=80=A2 Collaborate with the multiple teams and product to deliver working solutions
p.9: =E2=80=A2 Working knowledge of Google cloud platform (or another cloud platform)
p.10: =E2=80=A2 Quick learner, motivated, independent worker who is willing to learn and grow with the organization
p.11: =E2=80=A2 Be able to communicate within and outside the team clearly =E2=80=93 verbal and written
p.12: =E2=80=A2 Follow organizational practices using git, CI/CD, Jira, documentation
p.17: =E2=80=A2 Minimum 3+ years SQL development experience =E2=80=93 Postgres experience will be a plus
p.18: =E2=80=A2 Google Cloud Platform experience will be a plus
p.19: =E2=80=A2 Experience in PL/pgSQL, including stored procedures, functions, triggers, and views
p.20: =E2=80=A2 Experience working with large datasets using PostgreSQL (on any cloud based infrastructure)
p.21: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of databases design principles, query optimization, index management, integrity checks, statistics
p.22: =E2=80=A2 Bachelor degree in Computer Science or related field. Advanced technical degree and/or related training a plus
p.23: =E2=80=A2 Strong interpersonal (verbal and written) communication skills
p.24: =E2=80=A2 Strong problem solving, debugging, and solution development skills
p.25: =E2=80=A2 Ability to deliver in a fast-paced Continuous Development Agile Environment.
